feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • perf: Speed up User Type booking page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20516
  • fix: fixed language translations by @Neon-20 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20488
  • feat: Added new table under Insights page for most cancelled bookings by @itsalam in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19858
  • fix: Fixing the overlapping timezone dropdown menu by @Pratheek555 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20487
  • chore: Salesforce - Handle datetime and textarea field types by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20539
  • fix: Updated DateRangePicker in limit future booking by @21prnv in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20483
  • perf: /event-types/[type] — use server-fetched data to skip client-side trpc fetch by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20497
  • fix: ooo calibration for google calendar busy times by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20542
  • feat: v2 admin GET bookings, user information by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20221
  • feat: add new UI component for multi option inputs by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20533
  • fix: badge dot sizes to be 8x8 by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20544
  • feat: Implements Greetmate.ai app into Cal.com by @cheike569 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19812
  • perf: Remove dynamic imports of Sentry by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20545
  • perf: Remove dynamic imports for Vital and libphonenumber-js by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20547
  • fix: toggle group segment design by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20549
  • docs: platform refresh tokens and team event type atoms by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20524
  • fix: platform dialog portal issue [Atoms] by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20553
  • perf: Slim down loggedInViewer round 2 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20535
  • fix: add border to dialog footer by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20543
  • feat: update translations via @lingodotdev by @maxprilutskiy in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20559
  • refactor: SCIM - handleGroupEvents by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20537
  • chore: remove unused dep—react-intl by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20531

New Contributors

  • @Pratheek555 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20487
  • @cheike569 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/19812

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.15...v5.1.16

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Use createCallerFactory since createCaller method is deprecated by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20467
  • fix: broken getBusyTimes test in TZ!=UTC by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20555
  • chore: Migration to backfill EventType.userId with B, if null by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20562
  • perf: leverage trpc initialData for event-types page by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20496
  • fix: update German translation for 'cancel' to 'Stornieren' by @Brijeshthummar02 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20565
  • fix: enabling weights on RR events breaks atoms by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20297
  • fix: improve booking page error boundary + remove dynamic imports from Booker by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20560
  • feat: enable 'Overlay Calendar' enabled by default for signed in users by @sanchitttt in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/18188
  • fix: Require confirmation on toggling delegation credential by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20576
  • feat: support searchTerm in Filter Segment by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20526
  • fix: turbo pack error in webhooks/new/page.tsx by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20581
  • revert: refactor v2 access and refresh tokens by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20589
  • fix: verification code truncation fix by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20592
  • perf: fetch data server side for /settings/webhooks by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20583
  • fix: all flaky e2e tests by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20476

New Contributors

  • @Brijeshthummar02 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20565

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.16...v5.1.17

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • revert: "chore: Migration to backfill EventType.userId with B, if null" by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20598
  • revert: "feat: enable 'Overlay Calendar' enabled by default for signe… by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20600
  • chore: Add id column in CalendarCache by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20578
  • fix: Layout is not being set properly on mobile screens by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20584
  • fix: weight filter should never return length=0 by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20588
  • feat: sticky-shell in event-types by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20566
  • fix: use real ip in throttler [v2] by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20606
  • fix: Incorrect booker URL for individual event types inside the org by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20602
  • feat: restrict attributes tab to admin/owners only (CAL-4852) by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20603
  • feat: Salesforce - on booking cancel, write to event object by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20601
  • fix(CAL-5435): Conditionally render selection bar buttons based on user role by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20604
  • fix: A few flakes by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20608

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.17...v5.1.18

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: use correct organizer info when admin accepts team booking requiring confirmation by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20612
  • fix: full page reload on routing forms by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20625
  • fix: separate Filter Segment implementation from DataTableProvider by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20587
  • feat: move workflow emails to smtp by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20293
  • chore: Add more Salesforce logging by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20639
  • feat: added rescheduled UI to Booking page and Booking Listing page by @krakenftw in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20401

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.18...v5.1.19

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v5.1.20
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: Admin unlocking user, also verify workflow steps by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20613
  • chore: Update CONTRIBUTING.md by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20641
  • feat: auto turn on overlay calendar while loggedin by @TusharBhatt1 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20610
  • feat: Removed offset start times feature from UI by @avnish100 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20634
  • feat: display year for bookings in different years by @devin-ai-integration in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20647
  • chore: remove unnecessary tests and mock data by @retrogtx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20648
  • fix: flaky ooo e2e test by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/20649

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v5.1.19...v5.1.20
